TransactionStateContext.ReceivingState: The fallback function enables the contract to receive Ether, updating the contract balance.
TransactionStateContext.WithdrawState: Withdrawal occurs when the owner or a specific address (if set) calls withdraw.

ExternalInteractions.OwnerTransfer: In Get and withdraw functions, the Owner address is sent the contract balance.
ExternalInteractions.UncheckedLowLevelCall: The Command function allows the Owner to execute arbitrary calls to other contracts with Ether.
